Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The carbon-scored troop transport was a spacecraft used by the Rebel Alliance.

The vessel was used during a raid on Spindrift Station in 3 ABY. It arrived after the station had been neutralized to pick up surviving Imperial personnel as prisoners of war. After Flying Bantha Squadron picked up the route coordinates for the Empire's secret armada, the transport accompanied the squadron back to Arbra.
